title: What We Do
intro: Our church life is shaped by Belonging to God's Family, Serving God's mission, and Giving God everything. These are some ways that we do that.

items.description: Park Youth is our collection of groups for secondary school age. Cornerstone youth club on Wednesday evenings and Faith Explorers during our Sunday services.

items.title: Park Communities
items.description: Midweek communities for Scripture, prayer, friendship, and local mission.

cta.description: The best way to get to know us is to come along. We gather every Sunday at 10:45am.
